Name: Basic Robe
Description: Basic wizard's robe with a +1 modifer to max health.

Name: Proper Robe
Description: A Proper Wizard's Robe is a long, flowing garment made of enchanted cloth that provides protection and boosts the wizard's magical abilities.

Name: Grim Robe
Description: The Grim Wizard's Robe is a dark, tattered garment that imbues the wizard with powerful necromantic abilities at the cost of their own life force.

Name: Master Robe
Description: The Master's Wizard's Robe is a prestigious garment crafted from rare materials, it enhances the wizard's magical skills and provides unmatched protection.
